name: Alexandra Reynolds
summary: Data analyst with a proven track record in e-commerce, leveraging Python and ML to drive business insights and optimize strategies. Experienced in translating complex data into actionable solutions for growth.

experience.title: Senior Data Analyst
experience.description: Led data-driven projects to enhance customer segmentation, resulting in a 15% increase in conversion rates. Developed predictive models for inventory optimization, reducing stockouts by 20%.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: Built recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, improving cross-selling by 25%. Conducted A/B testing on pricing strategies, leading to a 10% uplift in revenue.

projects.name: Customer Lifetime Value Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to forecast customer lifetime value, enabling personalized marketing strategies and increasing customer retention by 18%. Utilized Python, scikit-learn, and pandas.

projects.name: Market Basket Analysis
projects.description: Performed market basket analysis to uncover product associations and optimize promotions, resulting in a 12% boost in average order value. Leveraged Apriori algorithm and SQL for data extraction.
